Common.LocationDescription.Common.Text: Close to Downtown Charleston and Folly Beach.

Common.LongDescription.Common.Text: 0.30 Acres - 13,068 SF of vacant land near Signal Point Road on James Island.  Great accessibility to Folly Road as the main thoroughfare through James Island and it connects Highway 17 South and SC Highway 61 with Folly Beach.

Common.Strapline.Common.Text: Call for Offers June 25, 2021: 1471 Folly Road

Common.LocationDescription.Common.Text:
The two lots are directly across Folly Road from the new Riverland Market shopping center anchored by Publix grocery store.

Located in the Town of James Island and close to a full signalized intersection at Folly Road and Grimball/Ft. Johnson
Road.

Common.LongDescription.Common.Text:
Ideally positioned lots that total 0.93 acre with a total of 199 feet of frontage on Folly and 204 feet deep.
The lots are zoned office residential in the Folly Road South Village Overlay District. so there are a variety of uses
approved including but not limited to child care/school,general office,medical office,hair/nail/skin salons,coffee shop,
bank/ financial services,day care,bed and breakfast,veterinary services. For a complete list of approved uses,see the
Town of James Island zoning web site.

Common.Strapline.Common.Text: Vacant Land for Sale in Growing Area

Common.LocationDescription.Common.Text:
Situated just off the James Island Connector, this site is less than 4 miles to downtown Charleston. Less than 7 minutes from Folly Beach and easily
accessible to West Ashley and I-26

Common.LongDescription.Common.Text:
Recently back on the market, this site is 6.14 acres with 2.94 acres of highland and 3.2 acres of marsh on James Island Creek and Folly Road. The
highland has 376 feet of frontage on Folly Road. It provides exceptional visibility to Folly Road and spectacular views of James Island Creek. There are two warehouse type building on the site that were built around 1973. One is approx. 6,900 SF and the other is approx. 3,960 SF. All tenants are currently month-to-month.

The site has two curb cuts on Folly Road. The 2018 traffic count in front of the Harris Teeter was 43,800 cars per day.

Common.Strapline.Common.Text: Spectacular creek and downtown views from this land

Common.LocationDescription.Common.Text: Across the Ashley River in West Ashley. Minutes from Downtown Charleston

Common.LongDescription.Common.Text:
The piece of land at 317 Savannah Highway is located between the round Holiday Inn and the Waffle House just across the Ashley River Bridge from the Charleston Peninsula. 
The site has approval in place for a 150 room hotel. The site is zoned General Business and is in the 100/30 height zone so you are able to build up to 100 feet in the air. Great view potential.

Common.Strapline.Common.Text: Vacant land on the Ashley River for Sale

Common.LongDescription.Common.Text: 2,306  office/retail building on 0.4778 acres just over the Ashley River Bridge from Downtown Charleston.  Zoned GB (General Business)

Common.Strapline.Common.Text: Office/Retail Building for Sale just over the Ashley River

address.Common.Line1: Bees Ferry Road at Hunt Club Run

Common.ActualAddress.Common.Line1: Bees Ferry Road at Hunt Club Run

Common.PostalAddresses.Common.Line1: Bees Ferry Road at Hunt Club Run

Common.LongDescription.Common.Text: 2 acre parcel at the lighted intersection of Bees Ferry Rd and Hunt Club Run. Ideal site for a number of uses in this growing area. 2016 SCDOT traffic data shows 21,000+ VPD.

Common.Strapline.Common.Text: 2 acre parcel at the lighted intersection of Bees Ferry Rd and Hunt Club Run.
